# Objetivo
Class, take your seats! It's PRIME-time for a quiz... `nc jupiter.challenges.picoctf.org 58617`
# Pistas
1. [RSA info](https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/RSA_algorithm)
# Solución
Primera solución:
```
──(gio㉿kali)-[~/picoctf/rsapopquiz]
└─$ nc jupiter.challenges.picoctf.org 58617
Good morning class! It's me Ms. Adleman-Shamir-Rivest
Today we will be taking a pop quiz, so I hope you studied. Cramming just will not do!
You will need to tell me if each example is possible, given your extensive crypto knowledge.
Inputs and outputs are in decimal. No hex here!
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
q : 60413
p : 76753
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
n
IS THIS POSSIBLE and FEASIBLE? (Y/N):y
#### TIME TO SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT! ###
n: 4636878989
Outstanding move!!!


#### NEW PROBLEM ####
p : 54269
n : 5051846941
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
q
IS THIS POSSIBLE and FEASIBLE? (Y/N):y
#### TIME TO SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT! ###
q: 93089
Outstanding move!!!


#### NEW PROBLEM ####
e : 3
n : 
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
q
p
IS THIS POSSIBLE and FEASIBLE? (Y/N):   
┌──(gio㉿kali)-[~/picoctf/rsapopquiz]
└─$ python 
Python 3.11.6 (main, Oct  8 2023, 05:06:43) [GCC 13.2.0] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> q = 60413
>>> p = 76753
>>> p * q
4636878989
>>> p = 54269
>>> n = 5051846941
>>> n // p
93089

```
Segunda solución:
```
python exp.py

script:
from pwn import *
import os; os.system("clear")
s = connect("jupiter.challenges.picoctf.org", 58617)
#1
print(s.recvuntil(b"):").decode())
s.sendline(b"Y")
print(s.recvuntil(b":").decode())
q = 60413
p = 76753
n = p*q
print("n="+str(n))
s.sendline(str(n).encode())
#2
print(s.recvuntil(b"):").decode())
s.sendline(b"Y")
print(s.recvuntil(b":").decode())
p = 54269
n = 5051846941
q=n//p
print("q="+str(q))
s.sendline(str(q).encode())
#3
print(s.recvuntil(b"):").decode())
s.sendline(b"N")
#4
print(s.recvuntil(b"):").decode())
s.sendline(b"Y")
print(s.recvuntil(b":").decode())
q= 66347
p=12611
tn = (p-1)*(q-1)
print("tn="+str(tn))
s.sendline(str(tn).encode())
#5
print(s.recvuntil(b"):").decode())
s.sendline(b"Y")
print(s.recvuntil(b":").decode())
m = 6357294171489311547190987615544575133581967886499484091352661406414044440475205342882841236357665973431462491355089413710392273380203038793241564304774271529108729717
e = 3
n = 
c = pow(m,e,n)
print("c="+str(c))
s.sendline(str(c).encode())
#6
print(s.recvuntil(b"):").decode())
s.sendline(b"N")
#7
print(s.recvuntil(b"):").decode())
s.sendline(b"Y")
print(s.recvuntil(b":").decode())
q = 
p = 
e = 65537
tn = (p-1)*(q-1)
d= pow(e,-1,tn)
print("d="+str(d))
s.sendline(str(d).encode())
#8
print(s.recvuntil(b"):").decode())
s.sendline(b"Y")
print(s.recvuntil(b":").decode())
p = 
c = 
e = 65537
n = 
q = n //p
tn = (p-1)*(q-1)
d = pow(e,-1,tn)
m = pow(c,d,n)
print("m="+str(m))
s.sendline(str(m).encode())

print(bytes.fromhex(hex(m)[2:]).decode())
```

```
picoCTF{wA8_th4t$_ill3aGal..o26cefcb2}
```
# Notas adicionales
- RSA: Criptografia llave publica

| variable | significado   |
| -------- | ------------- |
| m        | texto plano   |
| c        | texto cifrado |
| p        | numero primo  |
| q        | número primo  |
| n        | modulo        |
| e        | llave publica |
| tn       | toti (euler)  |
| d        | llave privada |
$$
n = p *q
$$
$$
tn = (p-1)*(q-1) 
$$
$$
d = e mod tn -> pow(e,-1,tn)
$$
Para cifrar 
$$
c = m ^e mod *n -> pow(m,e,n)
$$
$$
m = c ^d mod *n -> pow(e,d,n)
$$
pwntool: Es para desarrollar exploits
exploit: código malicioso para explotar
# Referencias
